title: How to Make Cantaloupe with Lemon Balm

steps.headline: Cut the melon in half.
steps.description: Scoop out the flesh and place in a bowl. Keep the melon shell to one side.

steps.headline: Mash the flesh.
steps.description: Use a masher or the back of a fork to mash the flesh into a pulpy texture.

steps.headline: Add the chopped lemon balm leaves to the mash.
Put the mashed mixture back inside the melon shell.
Place in the refrigerator to chill for at least an hour before serving.
Serve.
steps.description: Place whole lemon balm leaves on the flesh as a garnish prior to serving. Provide a serving spoon to allow guests to scoop out as much as they'd like.

text: Cut the melon in half. Scoop out the flesh and place in a bowl. Keep the melon shell to one side. Mash the flesh. Use a masher or the back of a fork to mash the flesh into a pulpy texture. Add the chopped lemon balm leaves to the mash. Stir to blend through. Put the mashed mixture back inside the melon shell.  Place in the refrigerator to chill for at least an hour before serving.  Serve. Place whole lemon balm leaves on the flesh as a garnish prior to serving. Provide a serving spoon to allow guests to scoop out as much as they'd like. Finished.
